about_the_game:
Computer Physics Simulator 2023 - sequel of CPS 2020, innovation simulator about construct PC with physics of parts. There you can using operating system, using security camera(for watch street), watch videos and photos.

In this simulator you can borrow parts of computer: GPU, RAM, Water Cooling System, Motherboard, Computer chassis. You can borrow some furniture(chairs, armchair, tables, TV), that have physics, this way you can arrrange the furniture as you want. You can build PC together with your friends!

In this simulator you can build Computer of your Dream!
detailed_description:
Computer Physics Simulator 2023 - sequel of CPS 2020, innovation simulator about construct PC with physics of parts. There you can using operating system, using security camera(for watch street), watch videos and photos.

In this simulator you can borrow parts of computer: GPU, RAM, Water Cooling System, Motherboard, Computer chassis. You can borrow some furniture(chairs, armchair, tables, TV), that have physics, this way you can arrrange the furniture as you want. You can build PC together with your friends!

In this simulator you can build Computer of your Dream!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R7 240
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Computer Physics Simulator 2023

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Computer Physics Simulator 2023 - sequel of CPS 2020, innovation simulator about construct PC with physics of parts. There you can using operating system, using security camera(for watch street), listen music, watching videos and photos, play in games of different eras of game industry.
